meanings.definition: Relating to the treatment of mental disorders in children.
meanings.sent1: The orthopsychiatric approach focuses on helping children with mental health issues.
meanings.sent2: The clinic offers orthopsychiatric services for young patients with behavioral challenges.
meanings.sent3: The orthopsychiatric teddy bear helped calm the anxious child during therapy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an orthopsychiatric remedy, bringing comfort to troubled minds.
meanings.sent5: The colorful drawings in the waiting room created an orthopsychiatric atmosphere of healing.

meanings.definition: A person who specializes in the treatment of mental disorders in children.
